text:
- At AWS, we operate to
a world-class standard.

We'll help you operate in
the cloud, on premises,

or hybrid environments to run
your business efficiently.

We provide real-time visibility
of your cloud operations

from a central hub where
you can optimize performance
of your applications in one place,

plus better management of
workloads can enable cost savings

Who doesn't wanna save a
million dollars a year?
